entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, St. Alban's
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 8 except minus 12 inland.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light overnight. Low minus 8 except minus 12 inland. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 29 December 2022

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning and minus 5 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 29 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 5 with temperature rising to zero by morning.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy overnight. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 5 with temperature rising to zero by morning. Wind chill minus 9 in the evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 29 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 29 December 2022

entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 29 December 2022

entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. High plus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 29 December 2022
